Historical Epidemiological Data

historical_epi.Rmd

Cases and deaths

site_file$cases_deaths

Where available this includes the time series of cases and deaths for the country as reported in previous editions of the world malaria report. Other useful data include the world malaria report1 population at risk and uncertainty intervals for estimates.

Prevalence

site_file$prevalence

Where available this includes the population at risk weighted average parasite prevalence time series from the Malaria Atlas Project2

Plasmodium falciparuim parasite prevalence (PfPr) is reported for children aged between 2-10 years, summarized from the malaria atlas project raster entitled: “Plasmodium falciparum PR2 - 10 version 2020”.

Plasmodium vivax parasite prevalence (PvPr) is reported for individuals aged between 1-99 years, summarized from the malaria atlas project raster entitled: “Plasmodium vivax PR1-99 version 2020”.

Prevalence estimates are used for calibrating the baseline EIR using the cali package.

Citations

1.
World Health Organization. World malaria report. (2021).
2.
Malaria atlas project.
